title: What is Xfinite / Xfnite
content: Xfinite (also called Xfnite) is a building labeling project where workers label roofs and building shapes using satellite maps through Bitmappro and Ginger software. Work is flexible and output-based. No interview is required — only training and passing the precourse exam.

title: How to Start / Application Process
content: To start working: 1) Like and join the community Facebook group, 2) Take the Precourse Exam, 3) Generate an account, 4) Download required software, 5) Install software, 6) Login to Bitmappro, 7) Attend live training, 8) Complete hands-on training tasks, 9) Start working.

title: Precourse Exam
content: Applicants must take the Precourse Exam before training. There are no interviews. Passing the exam allows account generation and access to training.

title: Account Generation
content: After passing the Precourse Exam, generate an account for Bitmappro and Ginger software login. If generation fails, retake the exam.

title: Required Downloads
content: Download required software before training: 7-zip, VC-Redists (Visual C++ Runtimes All-in-One), and Ginger Software. These are required to run Bitmappro properly.

title: Software Installation
content: Install 7-zip first. Right-click Visual-C-Runtimes-All-in-One.zip → 7-zip → Extract Here → open folder → run Install_all.bat until finished.

title: Get Ginger ID and Password
content: Go to User Profile → Click Show Password → Copy Ginger ID and Password → Save in Notepad. These credentials are required for logging into the software.

title: Login to Bitmappro
content: Open ginger-2018.exe, enter Ginger ID and Password, update if prompted, restart program, then press arrow down or download icon to start tasks.

title: Training Overview
content: Training takes about 2 days and includes Precourse Exam, Live Training Module, Rules and Guidelines, Land Cover Training, and actual paid live labeling.

title: Hands-on Training Requirements
content: Before hands-on training: install all software, generate account, attend live session, and read rules and guidelines.

title: Live Session Schedule
content: Live training sessions are held at 8:00AM-9:30AM, 10:00AM-11:30AM, and 12:00PM-1:30PM.

title: Work Hours
content: Workers can work 2-8 hours per day or 10-20 days per month but must complete at least 40 hours every monthly cycle. Work time is flexible.

title: Rates and Pay
content: Base rate is $2 per 800 qualified features. Experienced labelers can earn about $3-$6+ per hour depending on speed and accuracy. Payout occurs every 4 weeks.

title: Fees and Charges
content: There is a 4% service fee, P115 management fee, and 12% admin fee deducted from earnings.

title: System Requirements
content: Minimum PC requirements: Quad Core CPU, 8GB RAM, Windows 7/10/11, mouse, stable internet (DSL, Fiber, LTE, Pocket WiFi or modem), and unlimited data recommended.

title: Work Review Process
content: Submitted work is checked by Checkers and approved by Judgers before being counted as qualified output.

title: Training Videos
content: Watch all training videos including Basic Labeling, Techniques, Switching Tasks, 3D Guide, Drawing Lines, and Multilayer labeling.

title: Verification After Training
content: After finishing hands-on training, fill out the verification form and wait for Cedrick Sabrine to approve access to rules and guidelines.

title: Troubleshooting
content: If Bitmappro does not open wait for registration approval. If Ginger ID invalid check spaces and copy correctly. For installation errors: redownload files, move to drive C, disable antivirus, restart WiFi, update Windows.

title: Community and Support
content: Join the XF Trainees Facebook group and community chat for announcements and support. You may contact Cedrick Sabrine directly for concerns.

title: Contact Information
content: Main contact: Cedrick Sabrine. Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/xf.cedrick/

title: Hiring Information
content: Xfnite opens limited slots (around 1,000 trainees). Applicants should apply early to secure a training schedule.
